channel.title: Parolee on the loose
channel.description:
Well in my town...a parolee is running from the sheriffs. Apparently its a big deal. the damn chopper keeps flying around my house with a spotlight, and its hard to sleep :(...but yeh, enough about my needs lol. Post what you think about this, or what you would do if you were me.
Article: http://www.ksby.com/Global/story.asp?S=7943214

item.title: Parolee on the loose
item.dc:creator: @HcoJustin HcoJustin
item.description:
@HcoJustin wrote:

[quote=“darkdemun”][quote author=HcoJustin link=topic=246791.msg2079147#msg2079147 date=1204287133]
Well in my town…a parolee is running from the sheriffs. Apparently its a big deal. the damn chopper keeps flying around my house with a spotlight, and its hard to sleep :(…but yeh, enough about my needs lol. Post what you think about this, or what you would do if you were me.

Article:
http://www.ksby.com/Global/story.asp?S=7943214
[/quote]

i’d do nothing, a parolee… big fucking deal. no-one here cares seriously[/quote]
well initial dispatch reports said he was carrying a shotgun…and You would have done something if the stupid police chopper kept shining its spotlight at your house

Read full topic

item.title: Parolee on the loose
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

He must have done something pretty bad, usually they don’t bother looking for them and wait for them to show themselves (it’s inevitable eventually)

Read full topic
